mapper.select: select ID, XINGMING, JUNRENBZH, ZHUFANGSX, ZHUFANGDZ, GUANLIDW, JINZHUSJ, ZUOLUOH, DONGHAO, FANGHAO, ZHUFANGXZM, HUXINGFLM, JIANZHUMJ, DANWEIDM, DAORUSJ, SHANGBAOBZ, SHUJUSZDW, XUHAO from bzfx.BZK_SLGX_YF_RYZFQK where ID = #{id}

select ID, XINGMING, JUNRENBZH, ZHUFANGSX, ZHUFANGDZ, GUANLIDW, JINZHUSJ, ZUOLUOH, DONGHAO, FANGHAO, ZHUFANGXZM, HUXINGFLM, JIANZHUMJ, DANWEIDM, DAORUSJ, SHANGBAOBZ, SHUJUSZDW, XUHAO from bzfx.BZK_SLGX_YF_RYZFQK limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into bzfx.BZK_SLGX_YF_RYZFQK(XINGMING, JUNRENBZH, ZHUFANGSX, ZHUFANGDZ, GUANLIDW, JINZHUSJ, ZUOLUOH, DONGHAO, FANGHAO, ZHUFANGXZM, HUXINGFLM, JIANZHUMJ, DANWEIDM, DAORUSJ, SHANGBAOBZ, SHUJUSZDW, XUHAO) values (#{xingming}, #{junrenbzh}, #{zhufangsx}, #{zhufangdz}, #{guanlidw}, #{jinzhusj}, #{zuoluoh}, #{donghao}, #{fanghao}, #{zhufangxzm}, #{huxingflm}, #{jianzhumj}, #{danweidm}, #{daorusj}, #{shangbaobz}, #{shujuszdw}, #{xuhao})

insert ignore into bzfx.BZK_SLGX_YF_RYZFQK(ID, XINGMING, JUNRENBZH, ZHUFANGSX, ZHUFANGDZ, GUANLIDW, JINZHUSJ, ZUOLUOH, DONGHAO, FANGHAO, ZHUFANGXZM, HUXINGFLM, JIANZHUMJ, DANWEIDM, DAORUSJ, SHANGBAOBZ, SHUJUSZDW, XUHAO) values (#{id}, #{xingming}, #{junrenbzh}, #{zhufangsx}, #{zhufangdz}, #{guanlidw}, #{jinzhusj}, #{zuoluoh}, #{donghao}, #{fanghao}, #{zhufangxzm}, #{huxingflm}, #{jianzhumj}, #{danweidm}, #{daorusj}, #{shangbaobz}, #{shujuszdw}, #{xuhao})
mapper.update:
update bzfx.BZK_SLGX_YF_RYZFQK
XINGMING = #{xingming},
JUNRENBZH = #{junrenbzh},
ZHUFANGSX = #{zhufangsx},
ZHUFANGDZ = #{zhufangdz},
GUANLIDW = #{guanlidw},
JINZHUSJ = #{jinzhusj},
ZUOLUOH = #{zuoluoh},
DONGHAO = #{donghao},
FANGHAO = #{fanghao},
ZHUFANGXZM = #{zhufangxzm},
HUXINGFLM = #{huxingflm},
JIANZHUMJ = #{jianzhumj},
DANWEIDM = #{danweidm},
DAORUSJ = #{daorusj},
SHANGBAOBZ = #{shangbaobz},
SHUJUSZDW = #{shujuszdw},
XUHAO = #{xuhao},
where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: select ${field},count(1) c from bzfx.BZK_SLGX_YF_RYZFQK group by ${field}
